text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to play csi bingo?
text.Response B: Sure, I can explain the rules of csi bingo.  In this game, the players all receive cards with a different grid of squares on them.  Each square of the grid has a different clue type on it, such as “Footprint”, “Weapon”, “Tire Track”, “Hair”, “Blood”, “Dental”, “Fiber”, “Prints”, “Marks”, “Photos”, “Video”, “Statement”, “DNA”, “Witness” or “Other”.  Each player attempts to be the first to complete a horizontal, vertical or diagonal row of squares by drawing the appropriate clues from the pile in the center of the table.

meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.

323.displayed_text:
Prompt

Can you tell me how to play csi bingo?

Response A

Response B

Sure, I can explain the rules of csi bingo. In this game, the players all receive cards with a different grid of squares on them. Each square of the grid has a different clue type on it, such as “Footprint”, “Weapon”, “Tire Track”, “Hair”, “Blood”, “Dental”, “Fiber”, “Prints”, “Marks”, “Photos”, “Video”, “Statement”, “DNA”, “Witness” or “Other”. Each player attempts to be the first to complete a horizontal, vertical or diagonal row of squares by drawing the appropriate clues from the pile in the center of the table.
